name: Let's Get Spooketh!
description:
Let's Get Spooketh is a little adventure game that puts you in the shoes of a priest tasked with exorcising haunted houses. 

Originally developed for the Scream Jam 2021 and further polished and expanded on. 

Designed and developed by: Radi Salamat https://www.artstation.com/radidar

Art and animation done by: 

Andrea Jovanovic- https://www.artstation.com/andreajovanovic
